title: minerx110
author: minerx110
content: Hey guys! This forum looks like the perfect place for me to spread the word about my miners which I have listed on zionodes. They are brand new which come with an option to be set up on one of their farms. You can check them out on their trading desk. Let me know if you have any questions.

comments.author: crypto_curious
comments.body: Quote from: minerx110 on August 24, 2022, 01:06:13 PMHey guys! This forum looks like the perfect place for me to spread the word about my miners which I have listed on zionodes. They are brand new which come with an option to be set up on one of their farms. You can check them out on their trading desk. Let me know if you have any questions.What miners you have?
